page.title: 16PRESTWICH HOSPITAL
page.content: Prestwich Hospital caters for 900 patients.The way in which it treats the patients has altered considerably since the first records in 1889.Then the patients were kept under very severe supervision and were not allowed out of the hospital grounds, which were surrounded by a high fence. Now the emphasis is on rehabilitation and the patients are encouraged to look after themselves.Group activities include the value of money,personal; hygiene,cooking etc. thus getting patients ready to cope with life outside the Hospital.Many come to the village to shop, and use their leisure time watching television or attending discos or bingo sessions held in the Patients Cafe.
